      style sheet = strong colors,
      style sheet = vary dashing,
      1 = {pin in data = {text = {1 tier}, when=x is 2, pin length = 2ex}},
      2 = {pin in data = {text = {2 tiers}, when=x is 2, pin length = 2ex}},
